# tfc_toolbox_py
This is a tool box. You can use some tools to accelerate development efficiency.

## Install
You can install this package by pip:
```shell
pip install tfc_toolbox_py
```

## How to use it
```python
import tfc_toolbox_py as tfc
print(tfc.math.add(1, 2))
```

## Tools
### Account
- [x] Input password
- [x] Change password
### Math
- [x] Sum
- [x] Difference
### Console
- [ ] Menu
